param.name: editlink.ditamap.edit.url
param.desc: The URL of DITA Map opened in Web Auhtor or Content Fusion. For Web Author simply open the root DITA Map in Web Author and copy from browser's address bar the whole URL. The value may look like 'https://www.oxygenxml.com/oxygen-xml-web-author/app/oxygen.html?url=webdav-https%3A%2F%2Fwww.oxygenxml.com%2Foxygen-xml-web-author%2Fplugins-dispatcher%2Fwebdav-server%2Fdita%2Fflowers%2Fflowers.ditamap&author=Anonymous'. For Content Fusion create a task with all DITA files including the Map, open the task in browser, go to the root DITA Map file and copy from browser's address bar the whole URL. The value may look like 'https://fusion.oxygenxml.com/tasks/asdalongidasd/edit/flowers.ditamap'.
